Articles.Content:
No, but you missed yes by 10 seconds.

The person below me has made ASCII art.

Edited April 22, 2013 by Flymetothemun
gramer durp

False.

The user below me live in Europe.

False. But my grandparents did!

This sentence is false. dont think about it dont think about it dont think about it dont think about it dont think about it

Both.

The user below me is about to eat food right now.

No, but you missed "Yes." by a couple minutes.

The person below me is about or is drinking.

False. Just got done eating food.

The user below me had bacon and eggs for breakfast.

False.

The next person will not do nothing.

true.

The next person likes butter...

True.

The next user likes cheese.

Mmm...cheese.

The first user on the next page likes cheese AND his favorite type is mozzarella.

False, I don't care for cheese except processed cheese food.

The user below me will know who the "Ghost Who Walks" is

False, not a clue.

The next user's favorite cheese is Pepper Jack!

False.

The user below me has played Spore.

Played it and loved it

The user below me knows the meaning of life, the universe and everything.

(And the Ghost Who Walks is the Phantom)

False, no one knows everything.

The user below me plays Omegalodon.

False, please specify only games I know.

False, no one knows everything.

*COUGH*42*COUGH*

The first user on the next page likes cheese AND his favorite type is mozzarella.

Nuuu, I would have said true!

The person below me feels like an idiot.

False, for now.

The user below me has landed on Gilly using RCS thrusters.

False. Only EVA jetpack.

The user below me knows how to typing.

True, I'm pretty good at typing. (Sometimes my fingers type faster than I can think of things to say, then dsfklahdfadhgdadjihjhgouasdgh comes out)

The user below me plays KSP on their crappy laptop.

*snoooorrrrreeeeee* Nyaaaa~ Adachi what d'hell 'r ya talkin' about.... ZzzzzzzzZZZZZzzzz......stop putting shaved chocolate in th~....zzzzzZZZZZZZZzzzzzzzzZZZZzzzzzz

The user below me didn't hibernate all day today...

[EDIT]: Ninja'd by a hawk. And false, I have a high-powered gaming PC

True.

The user below me likes creating pixel/anime/art.

*snoooorrrrreeeeee* Nyaaaa~ Adachi what d'hell 'r ya talkin' about.... ZzzzzzzzZZZZZzzzz......stop putting shaved chocolate in th~....zzzzzZZZZZZZZzzzzzzzzZZZZzzzzzz

The user below me didn't hibernate all day today...

True, I have school like a good boy. (I do subjects 4 years ahead of me, so tactical headache inbound)

Dreaming about anime is unhealthy. It distracts your mind from whats real. Quote from Jake the Dog.

The user below me has had a dream about KSP once.

EDIT: I refuse to listen to ninjas.

True, how do you think PfL started?

The user below me is unhealthy in general

And with that I fluff my pillow and go back to sleep

I go true, as I interpret unhealthy as in mental health. OCD ain't fun.

The user below me has OCD.

False. I'm only a cynical sadist.

The user below me plays eve online.
